testSuite.name: realty
testSuite.description: Тестирование реальных запросов из модуля realty

parser.query: SELECT epa.ID AS "ID;<hidden/>", epa.plumbingSize AS "plumbingSize", epa.sewerageSize AS "sewerageSize", epa.heatingSize AS "heatingSize", epa.bathroomSize AS "bathroomSize", epa.gasSize AS "gasSize", epa.hotWaterSize AS "hotWaterSize", epa.electricCookersSize AS "electricCookersSize", epa.plumbingGasHeatingSize AS "plumbingGasHeatingSize" FROM extendedPropAttributes epa WHERE epa.propertyID = <parameter:propertyID refColumn="properties.ID"/>
parser.format: SELECT epa.ID AS "ID;<hidden/>", epa.plumbingSize AS "plumbingSize", epa.sewerageSize AS "sewerageSize", epa.heatingSize AS "heatingSize", epa.bathroomSize AS "bathroomSize", epa.gasSize AS "gasSize", epa.hotWaterSize AS "hotWaterSize", epa.electricCookersSize AS "electricCookersSize", epa.plumbingGasHeatingSize AS "plumbingGasHeatingSize" FROM extendedPropAttributes epa WHERE epa.propertyID = <parameter:propertyID refColumn="properties.ID"/>

parser.query: SELECT b.ID AS "Code", CASE WHEN b.buildingNo IS NULL THEN '' WHEN b.wing IS NULL AND b.letters IS NULL THEN b.buildingNo WHEN b.wing IS NULL AND b.letters IS NOT NULL THEN ( b.buildingNo || CASE WHEN b.letters LIKE '1%' OR b.letters LIKE '2%' OR b.letters LIKE '3%' OR b.letters LIKE '4%' OR b.letters LIKE '5%' OR b.letters LIKE '6%' OR b.letters LIKE '7%' OR b.letters LIKE '8%' OR b.letters LIKE '9%' THEN ( '/' || b.letters ) ELSE b.letters END ) WHEN b.wing IS NOT NULL AND b.letters IS NULL THEN ( b.buildingNo || ' корп. ' || b.wing ) WHEN b.wing IS NOT NULL AND b.letters IS NOT NULL THEN ( b.buildingNo || CASE WHEN b.letters LIKE '1%' OR b.letters LIKE '2%' OR b.letters LIKE '3%' OR b.letters LIKE '4%' OR b.letters LIKE '5%' OR b.letters LIKE '6%' OR b.letters LIKE '7%' OR b.letters LIKE '8%' OR b.letters LIKE '9%' THEN ( '/' || b.letters ) ELSE b.letters END || ' корп. ' || b.wing ) WHEN b.wing IS NOT NULL THEN ( b.buildingNo || ' корп. ' || b.wing ) ELSE b.buildingNo END AS "Name", b.buildingNo AS "sortCol" FROM buildings b WHERE b.kladrStreetCode IS NULL ORDER BY sortCol, b.wing
parser.format: SELECT b.ID AS "Code", CASE WHEN b.buildingNo IS NULL THEN '' WHEN b.wing IS NULL AND b.letters IS NULL THEN b.buildingNo WHEN b.wing IS NULL AND b.letters IS NOT NULL THEN ( b.buildingNo || CASE WHEN b.letters LIKE '1%' OR b.letters LIKE '2%' OR b.letters LIKE '3%' OR b.letters LIKE '4%' OR b.letters LIKE '5%' OR b.letters LIKE '6%' OR b.letters LIKE '7%' OR b.letters LIKE '8%' OR b.letters LIKE '9%' THEN ( '/' || b.letters ) ELSE b.letters END ) WHEN b.wing IS NOT NULL AND b.letters IS NULL THEN ( b.buildingNo || ' корп. ' || b.wing ) WHEN b.wing IS NOT NULL AND b.letters IS NOT NULL THEN ( b.buildingNo || CASE WHEN b.letters LIKE '1%' OR b.letters LIKE '2%' OR b.letters LIKE '3%' OR b.letters LIKE '4%' OR b.letters LIKE '5%' OR b.letters LIKE '6%' OR b.letters LIKE '7%' OR b.letters LIKE '8%' OR b.letters LIKE '9%' THEN ( '/' || b.letters ) ELSE b.letters END || ' корп. ' || b.wing ) WHEN b.wing IS NOT NULL THEN ( b.buildingNo || ' корп. ' || b.wing ) ELSE b.buildingNo END AS "Name", b.buildingNo AS "sortCol" FROM buildings b WHERE b.kladrStreetCode IS NULL ORDER BY sortCol, b.wing
